p:
Penetrability Index [PI] value was developed specifically for the A.D.A.M. test
40 . The formula for PI = C/B - (C/M)/(M/B); where C, B, M refer to the efficacy of biofilm reduction. PI value ≤ 1 describes dressings whose active substance displays good tolerability; PI <1> 2 describes dressings whose active substance displays moderate tolerability; PI ≤ 2 describes dressings whose active substance displays poor tolerability
40 .
